synopsis.text: Middle schooler Sunao Moriyama's life takes an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon an adorable creature nestled among the potatoes and mayonnaise in his fridge, whom he affectionately names Potemayo. With Potemayo accompanying him everywhere, even perched atop his head, Sunao's mundane life becomes anything but ordinary. But when a second mysterious creature, Guchuko, emerges from the same fridge, Sunao's newfound friendship with Potemayo is put to the test. Unlike Potemayo, Guchuko seems to harbor a sinister side, making Sunao's life even more chaotic and unpredictable. As Sunao navigates the challenges of middle school, he must also manage the antics of Potemayo and Guchuko, creating an exciting and entertaining adventure that you won't want to miss!
